DOMTextRun.characters: Uses SatProf standard step-by-step learning template (modified) and include "IncludeStepByStep5Away.as" to work around problem of this.loaderInfo.url not returning the SWF file path, and EXIT_FRAME events not working.

tt_1 To use external translation file, see top of Actions scripts. See SP-DEV-006 for how to use translation texts. Use Classic Dynamic multiline textfields. Use HTML for bulleted lists. You may use these tags:
A simple TLF text field. Use Verdana font for normal text. Remember to embed fonts for any dynamic text field (Basic Latin, Punctuation, and Latin 1).
● This is TLF text bulleted with indents and tabs set. ● Another bullet with wrap-around text that goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on. ● And another bullet.
